attributes.action: Allow the BBC and ITV to have pay per view for Sport
attributes.additional_details:
If we allowed BBC and ITV to have pay per view for major sports occasions it could easily compete for the rights to sport coverage. It would also cost less per customer as there are more homes using Digital (30million) than Sky's 2m and BT's 6 Million.

There are plenty of spare channels on Digital some are already suitable for pay per view.
